00010 ORHeaderProcessor::ORHeaderProcessor() : ORDataProcessor(new ORHeaderDecoder)
00011 {
00012   fHeaderDecoder = dynamic_cast<ORHeaderDecoder*>(fDataDecoder);

00020 
00021 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORHeaderProcessor::ProcessDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00022 {
00023   /* Here we explicitly check if we have at least a reasonable buffer length. */
00024   if (fHeaderDecoder->IsHeader(record[0])) {
00025     if (fHeader.LoadHeaderString(fHeaderDecoder->HeaderStringOf(record), 
00026       (fHeaderDecoder->NBytesOf(record)<8) ? 0 : fHeaderDecoder->NBytesOf(record)-8)) {
00027       return kSuccess;
00028     }
00029     else {
00030       return kFailure;
00031     }
00032   }
00033   return kFailure;
00034 }
